Events.RelatedDescription: Opened pull request "remove serializable class attribute and ctor for possible mitigation …" (#1451) at dotnet/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
…of CVE-2023-21538 

Needs review and discussion; addresses #1450

Events.RelatedDescription: Opened issue "Security vulnerability CVE-2023-21538 (System.Private.DataContractSerialization 4.3.0)" (#1450) at dotnet/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
The latest version (2.9.1) of Open-XML-SDK depends on `System.Private.DataContractSerialization` latest version (4.3.0).

`System.Private.DataContractSerialization` has a [known security vulnerability CVE-2023-21538](https://msrc.microsoft.com/update-guide/vulnerability/CVE-2023-21538).

Any plans on how to tackle this? Microsoft hasn't provided an update for `System.Private.DataContractSerialization` that fixes this, so there is no way to just upgrade the dependency and be done with it.

The only thing that is viable currently is to stop depending on `System.Private.DataContractSerialization`, but I don't know if that is possible.

Events.RelatedDescription: Closed issue "Help with adding Form Controls to Excel file using Open XML C#." (#1449) at dotnet/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
Hi there,
I am using Open XML SDK in one of the projects I am currently working on to create Excel file that would need to have Check boxes(Form Controls not ActiveX controls) in some of the cells. The problem I have is that no matter what I try for adding those controls it simply doesn't work. I even tried getting the code with Open XML Productivity Tool to see how they are added but that also didn't work, it added VmlDrawingsPart to the Excel file but the Check Boxes were not visible. Also i looked for documentation on how to add FormControls but was unsuccessful in finding it.  So I was wondering if it is even possible to add Controls to excel file using Open XML and if it is could you help me with code or documentation on how to do it.
Thanks in advance.

Events.RelatedDescription: Opened issue "Help with adding Form Controls to Excel file using Open XML C#." (#1449) at dotnet/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
Hi there,
I am using Open XML SDK in one of the projects I am currently working on to create Excel file that would need to have Check boxes(Form Controls not ActiveX controls) in some of the cells. The problem I have is that no matter what I try for adding those controls it simply doesn't work. I even tried getting the code with Open XML Productivity Tool to see how they are added but that also didn't work, it added VmlDrawingsPart to the Excel file but the Check Boxes were not visible. Also i looked for documentation on how to add FormControls but was unsuccessful in finding it.  So I was wondering if it is even possible to add Controls to excel file using Open XML and if it is could you help me with code or documentation on how to do it.
Thanks in advance.
